== Introduction ==

The <nowiki>[[MacBookPro|Macbook Pro]]</nowiki> 6,1 is '''highly compatible''' with Ubuntu 12.04 Oneiric. 

Ubuntu 12.04 supports most all of the hardware on the MacbookPro-6,1  out of the box. There are a lot of different articles on this install which suggest different things of various complexity, but after reFit is installed, installation is standard. 

== Install Instructions ==

* install reFit http://refit.sourceforge.net/
* boot installation CD for 12.04 64bit version. (booting took LONG time)
* install
* installed all updates

All hardware worked immediately.
